incomingStudentInstructions.description: New, incoming freshmen placement testing any Tuesday, Wednesday or Thursday during the month of July. Please arrive between hours of 8:30 AM and 1 PM to begin testing. Testing generally takes about one hour per assessment.
tests: Spanish (any student with prior language experience/native speakers)

openHouses.description: Open Houses will begin at 10am at UHSSE and allow you to tour the school, see our robotics team in action, and meet the teachers and students of UHSSE!
